column4: hey Cafuego and Seveas, never seen you guys on irc before, love your repos though :)
Hey guys, im trying to generate a repository using falcon 2.0, however on running "falcon scan" or "falcon clean" the program crashes with the following output: http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/41040/
falcon is not included in ubuntu and #ubuntu does not support it
the falcon deb in your feisty repo is broken :(
